backend/main.mo: Defines many user, game, event, chat, reward, and control data types and initializes access control and approval states for the backend actor.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a light‑theme color‑token update to the affected frontend CSS file and related components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing major frontend pages, hooks, and components including games, queries, styling, and feature behavior.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx with a root div container.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app routing file wiring all pages, games, and UI providers such as themes, query client, and global layout components.
frontend/src/components/AchievementCeleb: Displays confetti or firework celebration overlays triggered globally through a queued event system using portals.
Shows approval‑required UI with request functionality and loads children only when the caller is approved.
frontend/src/components/avatar3d/AvatarP: Renders a 3D-style avatar preview with drag and touch rotation, pulling visual variants from avatarVariants and displaying parts like hair, head, and headwear.
frontend/src/components/avatar3d/AvatarR: Empty or placeholder file for future avatar rig logic.
frontend/src/components/avatar3d/avatarV: Provides functions that map avatar config values to style variants such as colors, sizes, and types for body, head, hair, pants, headwear, and shoes.
Provides floating encouragement messages using a queue and portal‑based animated notifications.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer displaying copyright text with a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/GameLayout.tsx: Provides a game wrapper with scoring, sound toggle, navigation, and trophy-based pet upgrade logic.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Renders the app header with navigation, login/logout handling, and admin access controls.
frontend/src/components/HomepageFeatures: Displays the homepage feature grid with icons, descriptions, and a start button.
frontend/src/components/InstantMiniActiv: Implements three age-based mini‑games with canvas rendering, timers, and simple interactions.
frontend/src/components/learn-hub/ArtsMu: Implements multiple arts and music mini‑games—color mixing, drawing, rhythm, instruments, and creative prompts—with step tracking and scoring.
frontend/src/components/learn-hub/Discov: Implements fact, how‑it‑works, world explorer, and inventions games with step progression, scoring, and optional invention story fetching.
frontend/src/components/learn-hub/Readin: Provides reading and vocabulary mini‑games including phonics, word building, stories, spelling, and definitions with progress and scoring.
frontend/src/components/learn-hub/Scienc: Component defining multiple themed science mini‑games and rendering interactive lesson steps with scoring.
frontend/src/components/MascotGuide.tsx: Shows a context-aware mascot assistant with voice narration and dismissible help messages.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Provides a form for creating a user profile with validation and backend mutation.
frontend/src/content/seasonalEventStorie: Exports a dataset of kid‑safe seasonal event stories with narration scripts and metadata.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks to manage Internet Identity login, stored identities, and auth client lifecycle.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines types and sets up query utilities using the actor and identity hooks for backend data operations.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind‑based global styles defining theme variables, dark mode, fonts, and utility classes including neon and 3D avatar effects.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts React, initializing QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Admin dashboard page providing user management, status changes, restrictions, and activity logs with permission checks.
frontend/src/pages/ArtGalleryPage.tsx: Artwork upload and gallery page supporting file validation, previews, public/private submissions, and listing user/public art.
frontend/src/pages/AvatarCreatorPage.tsx: Avatar customization page allowing users to edit, randomize, preview, and save 3D avatar configurations.
frontend/src/pages/CertificatesPage.tsx: Certificate creation page generating personalized achievement certificates via canvas and listing existing certificates.
frontend/src/pages/ChatModule.tsx: Basic chat interface with contacts, message history, sending messages, and safety-focused UI elements.
frontend/src/pages/ChatPage.tsx: Chat interface showing online users, message history, and real-time messaging with auto‑refresh and status updates.
frontend/src/pages/CraftDIYPage.tsx: Displays categorized craft projects with steps, materials, badges, and completion handling, using mock data fallback.
frontend/src/pages/CreativeFunHub.tsx: Hub page listing creative entertainment modules and routing to each module on selection.
frontend/src/pages/DanceChallengePage.ts: Dance routine player with timed pose progression and optional camera feed, allowing routine selection and playback control.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Main dashboard listing all modules with search filtering, admin‑restricted items, and navigation handling.
frontend/src/pages/EventCardCreator.tsx: UI for designing event cards with templates, fonts, stickers, and actions to download or share the final card.
frontend/src/pages/EventCardsPage.tsx: Interactive card designer allowing users to select templates, colors, and enter text, with download validation and preview support.
frontend/src/pages/EventsModule.tsx: Event management module enabling creation, listing, and categorization of events with date selection and auto‑assigned icons.
frontend/src/pages/EventsPage.tsx: Full events manager with reminders, notifications, date picking, and CRUD-style interactions for personal events.
frontend/src/pages/FeedbackPage.tsx: Feedback submission interface with selectable feedback types, text input, and integration with query hooks for storing user feedback.
frontend/src/pages/FeedbackSystem.tsx: Standalone feedback form supporting mood selection, type categorization, anonymity, and simple validation before submission.
frontend/src/pages/FunnyFartHub.tsx: A playful UI listing many themed fart sounds with colors, emojis, and audio playback controls. Provides navigation and randomized sound features.
frontend/src/pages/games/AmbulanceRescue: Arcade-style rescue game where players move an ambulance to save patients before time runs out.
frontend/src/pages/games/BalloonPop.tsx: Implements a balloon‑popping game with timed spawning, animation, scoring, and pop effects using requestAnimationFrame. Manages game state with refs to avoid re-renders and includes a 60‑second timer and high score tracking.
frontend/src/pages/games/BibbleAdventure: Defines a platformer where the player moves, jumps, collects coins, and avoids falling, with gravity, platform collision, and keyboard controls. Tracks score, coin states, and high score.
frontend/src/pages/games/BirthdayCakeDec: Provides a click‑based cake decorating game where users place emoji decorations on a cake to earn points. Supports selecting decoration types, tracking placements, scoring, and finishing for bonus points.
frontend/src/pages/games/BirthdayCakeMak: Implements a step‑based cake creation game where players choose a base, flavor, and layers to build a cake and earn points. Tracks game steps, selections, scoring, and high scores.
frontend/src/pages/games/BossesLearnHabi: Canvas shooter where the boss learns from recent player movement patterns and predicts attacks; handles movement, projectiles, and restart logic.
frontend/src/pages/games/BossFightOnly.t: Canvas‑based boss fight game with player movement, boss phases, projectiles, reversed controls, and scoring. Manages real‑time input and combat logic using a game loop and internal state refs.
frontend/src/pages/games/CatGrapplingHoo: Physics game where a cat grapples toward clicked points, collects food, avoids enemies, and updates movement with gravity and friction.
frontend/src/pages/games/CityMovingPlatf: Platformer with rotating moving platforms, gravity, jumping, and world rotation; tracks score by distance and triggers game over on falling.
Player auto-moves toward a goal while the user controls selected enemies to block or avoid them; levels increase enemy count and scoring.
frontend/src/pages/games/CronkerKontry.t: Incremental resource-management game featuring buildings, upgrades, achievements, and prestige mechanics with per-second resource generation.
frontend/src/pages/games/DelayedControls: Canvas game where player movement is delayed via an input queue, with obstacles, coins, and collision-based scoring.
frontend/src/pages/games/DungeonJanitorS: Top‑down cleaning game where the player clears debris types for points while debris respawns over time.
Space survival shooter with moving enemies, collectible energy orbs, projectiles, AI hints, and adaptive difficulty.
frontend/src/pages/games/EnemiesPlatform: Platformer where flying enemies act as moving platforms and hazards while the player jumps toward a goal.
frontend/src/pages/games/EnemyControlsCa: Chase‑style game where the camera follows an enemy instead of the player while collecting coins and avoiding capture.
frontend/src/pages/games/EscapeRoomUnive: Implements a timed multi-room item-finding escape game with room unlocking, scoring, and inventory management.
frontend/src/pages/games/EverythingBreak: Canvas platformer where platforms break after use, with physics, level progression, and score tracking.
frontend/src/pages/games/EverythingIsBut: Canvas game where clicking randomly placed buttons triggers actions affecting movement, score, and revealing the goal.
frontend/src/pages/games/FamousPlaces.ts: Multiple-choice quiz about famous places with scoring, answer feedback, and progression through preset questions.
frontend/src/pages/games/FinalBoss.tsx: Canvas defense game where players place traps to stop advancing heroes from damaging a boss, with waves and scoring.
frontend/src/pages/games/FloorIsLiar.tsx: Canvas-based platformer where players navigate platforms labeled truthfully or falsely, gain points by reaching the goal, and lose on unsafe platforms.
frontend/src/pages/games/ForestNight.tsx: Top-down movement game where players collect coins in darkness with shrinking visibility and a countdown timer.
frontend/src/pages/games/GadgetCombat.ts: Player selects gadgets to stun or capture enemies approaching them while scoring and avoiding contact.
frontend/src/pages/games/GlitchWorldEsca: Platformer with glitch mode that changes which platforms are solid as the player climbs without falling.
frontend/src/pages/games/GrandmaSecretAr: Multi-minigame arcade featuring whack-a-mole, catch, and memory games with score tracking and stateful canvas interaction.
frontend/src/pages/games/InventoryIsEnem: Canvas-based game where player movement and health are affected by inventory weight while collecting items and avoiding enemies.
frontend/src/pages/games/LiesAndTruths.t: Platformer with randomized true/false hints where the player navigates platforms and reaches a goal while evaluating hint reliability.
frontend/src/pages/games/MemoryMatch.tsx: Emoji-based memory matching game with increasing grid size, scoring, and level progression.
Room-based puzzle game where each room has a color, pattern, or sequence puzzle the player must solve to progress.
frontend/src/pages/games/MonsterMaze.tsx: Grid maze game where the player navigates to an exit while avoiding moving monsters and earning score for movement.
frontend/src/pages/games/MoveWhenBlink.t: Canvas game where the player can only move while blinking, avoiding enemies and reaching a goal to score points.
frontend/src/pages/games/NumberRunner.ts: Lane‑runner math game that spawns moving obstacles with questions; players answer correctly to score and avoid collision.
frontend/src/pages/games/OneButtonHero.t: One‑button action game using press duration for jump, dash, or shield while avoiding scrolling obstacles.
frontend/src/pages/games/OneRoomInfinite: Single-room game that cycles through multiple mini‑games like dodge, collect, memory, and platforming with a shared score.
frontend/src/pages/games/PacMan.tsx: Grid‑based Pac‑Man clone with movable ghosts, pellets, maze generation, lives, and standard arrow‑key movement.
frontend/src/pages/games/PauseMechanic.t: Canvas-based game where the player collects coins, avoids hazards, and triggers random pause effects that alter gameplay. Manages movement, collision, pause logic, and game state tracking.
frontend/src/pages/games/PoliceBuddyChas: Lane-based chase game where the player moves left/right to catch falling criminals before they escape. Handles spawning, movement, collision detection, and incremental difficulty.
frontend/src/pages/games/PumpkinSmash.ts: Timed clicking game where pumpkins bounce around a canvas and award points when clicked. Handles animation, collision with walls, scoring, and respawning pumpkins.
frontend/src/pages/games/ReverseProgress: Platformer where abilities are removed each level while avoiding enemies and reaching a goal. Implements movement, abilities, platforms, enemies, and difficulty scaling.
frontend/src/pages/games/ScreenIsEnemy.t: Player collects coins while random screen effects like shake or shrink make navigation harder. Manages player movement, coin spawning, effect timing, and score tracking.
frontend/src/pages/games/ShapeShiftingWo: Implements a top‑down shapeshifting game with movement, obstacle interaction based on form, and collectible-based level progression and scoring.
frontend/src/pages/games/SlimeEvolutionA: Canvas-based arena game where a slime moves, evolves into forms with temporary abilities, and avoids or attracts procedurally spawned enemies.
frontend/src/pages/games/SoundBasedWorld: Canvas exploration game where movement generates sound waves for navigation, with obstacles, a goal, and simple collision handling.
frontend/src/pages/games/SpaceInvaders.t: React and canvas‑driven Space Invaders clone featuring waves of enemies, player bullets, movement controls, and wave-based progression.
frontend/src/pages/games/SpaceStationLif: Resource‑management game where the player selects roles, handles random events, moves on a map, and survives by maintaining resources over days.
frontend/src/pages/games/SpeedIsHealth.t: Canvas-based movement game where player speed affects health while avoiding obstacles and collecting coins.
frontend/src/pages/games/SpiderWebPuzzle: Node-click puzzle where players disconnect linked nodes to clear levels and free all nodes.
frontend/src/pages/games/SuperpowerTrain: Side-scrolling obstacle game with unlockable powers affecting movement and collision outcomes.
frontend/src/pages/games/SuperSpeedyRace: Lane-based racing game where obstacles spawn and move downward as the player dodges to score points.
frontend/src/pages/games/Tetris.tsx: Tetris implementation handling tetromino spawning, movement, rotation, line clearing, and scoring.
frontend/src/pages/games/ThemeParkBuilde: React theme-park management game where players place rides on a grid, earn income, manage happiness, and avoid game over.
frontend/src/pages/games/TicTacToe.tsx: Tic‑tac‑toe game with PvP and AI modes, win detection, draw logic, and basic AI decision-making.
frontend/src/pages/games/TimeControlAdve: Action game with time‑manipulation powers, spawning enemies, projectiles, and coins using a requestAnimationFrame loop.
frontend/src/pages/games/TimeLoopPizzaDe: Canvas-based delivery game where the player delivers pizzas, avoids obstacles, and resets via time loops when the timer expires.
frontend/src/pages/games/TinyHeroGiantWo: Side-scrolling platformer set in a giant world with physics, collectible coins, and a goal object.
frontend/src/pages/games/TutorialIsVilla: Canvas-based mini-game where a villainous tutorial spawns traps, fake coins, and messages while tracking score, movement, and collisions.
frontend/src/pages/games/WordWizard.tsx: Word-scramble game that selects random words, tracks time and score, and lets players assemble letters to form correct words.
frontend/src/pages/games/YoureLateAlways: Chaos-themed canvas game with moving projectiles, fires, and explosions where the player avoids hazards and progresses through levels.
frontend/src/pages/GamesHub.tsx: Displays a catalog of games with icons, categories, difficulties, and navigation into selected modules. Uses cards and badges to show game info.
frontend/src/pages/GamesModule.tsx: Shows categorized game listings with tabs, progress, and high scores. Allows selecting a game and viewing details via reusable cards.
frontend/src/pages/GreenScreenFunPage.ts: Lets users upload or capture photos and place them into cartoon scenes, with canvas compositing and image download. Includes camera integration and scene selection.
frontend/src/pages/InteractiveShortsPage: Implements an interactive branching story system with scenes, choices, and endings. Users pick a story, navigate scenes, and restart or return to the list.
frontend/src/pages/JokesGenerator.tsx: Static joke generator with categories, random selection, favorites, and simple share/audio actions.
frontend/src/pages/JokesPage.tsx: Dynamic jokes page using API hooks for listing, submitting, rating, and favoriting jokes with category filters.
frontend/src/pages/KaraokeModePage.tsx: Karaoke player showing song list, lyrics progression, and playback controls with adjustable volumes.
frontend/src/pages/LearnHubPage.tsx: Learning hub defining lesson categories and rendering interactive modules with progress and navigation.
frontend/src/pages/MusicRemixPage.tsx: Music remix builder allowing users to mix audio loops, control playback, visualize audio, and submit remixes.
frontend/src/pages/ParentalControl.tsx: UI for managing screen time, content filters, chat/video toggles, and admin user approvals using query hooks.
Loads and edits a user profile with name, age, avatar, and theme settings, then saves updates through backend hooks.
frontend/src/pages/RewardsAchievements.t: Displays static achievements, badges, challenges, and user stats like points and level.
frontend/src/pages/RewardsPage.tsx: Fetches and displays dynamic rewards, badges, and game stats, with badge interactions and celebration effects.
frontend/src/pages/ScaryHub.tsx: Shows a themed hub of spooky mini‑games with sound toggle and a timed surprise animation.
frontend/src/pages/SeasonalEventsPage.ts: Renders seasonal event activities, decorations, and stories with dynamic themes and activity completion logic.
frontend/src/pages/SmartHubPage.tsx: Displays a hub of categorized activities and games using user data, allowing navigation to different modules.
frontend/src/pages/SpinWheelPage.tsx: Implements a spin‑wheel reward system with cooldowns, animations, and reward history integration.
frontend/src/pages/StickerCreatorPage.ts: Provides a canvas-based drawing tool for creating and submitting custom stickers with brush controls.
frontend/src/pages/StoryBuilderPage.tsx: Enables building multi-scene stories with draggable elements and saves projects to the backend.
frontend/src/pages/VideoGenerator.tsx: UI for creating simple 2D videos using templates, characters, and basic settings with preview and export actions.
frontend/src/pages/VideoGeneratorPage.ts: Generates animated video frames from a story and renders them on a canvas with character and background selection.
frontend/src/pages/VideoHubPage.tsx: Displays categorized kids’ YouTube channels with details and modal previews, organized by age groups.
frontend/src/pages/VirtualPetHubPage.tsx: Manages a customizable virtual pet with accessories, home styles, happiness logic, and persistent user data.
frontend/src/utils/avatarConfig.ts: Provides default avatar settings and a helper to merge user avatar configs with defaults.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters with session persistence and hash support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, fonts, shadows, and container settings with custom UI tokens.
project_state.json: Metadata describing the project’s state and requirements for a focused UI color theme update without behavioral changes.
